CustomField.description: Indicates agreement lock is turned on for a version-aware record on first document check-out, thereby locking all the record’s documents to that user. Lock released on all documents on first check-in.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates agreement lock is turned on for a version-aware record on first document check-out, thereby locking all the record’s documents to that user. Lock released on all documents on first check-in.
CustomField.label: Use Agreement Locks for Versioning
